title: Zr6O8 core cluster with formula unit [Zr6O4(OH)4(OH2)8(CH3COO)4(SO4)4]·nH2O obtained under mild conditions
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,29910-29918
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03940H, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Andrea Y. Garzón-Serrano, Johan D. Lozano, Leon D. Perez, César A. Sierra, Mario A. Macías
Cluster with Zr6O8 core and formula unit [Zr6O4(OH)4(OH2)8(CH3COO)4(SO4)4]·nH2O was synthesized under mild conditions forming three-dimensional maze of tunnels.
